oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stickstoff- und Schwefelversorgung von Rapsbeständen im Ökologischen Landbau
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Böhm, Herwart
Kühne, Stefan
Ludwig, Tobias
Ulber, Bernd
Döring, Alexander
Saucke, Helmut
Wedemeyer, Rainer
Ebert, Ulrich
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this study results of 3 experimental years, 4 locations (2009-2011) and additionally 12 fields in northern and eastern Germany (only in 2011) are presented with regard to the nitrogen and sulphur status of oil seed rape. The nitrogen and sulphur level was often not sufficient, so that the fertilisation regimes have to be optimised.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Böhm, Herwart; Kühne, Stefan; Ludwig, Tobias; Ulber, Bernd; Döring, Alexander; Saucke, Helmut; Wedemeyer, Rainer and Ebert, Ulrich (2013) Stickstoff- und Schwefelversorgung von Rapsbeständen im Ökologischen Landbau. Paper at: 12. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Rheinische Friedrich-Wilhelms-Universität, Bonn, 5. bis 8. März 2013.
